content: this balaclava is knit from the bottom up it is the perfect piece for cold winter weather and it can be worn as a balaclava or a hood to warm your neck it is knitted in 100% alpaca wool and it feels super soft and cozy against the skin the neck is knitted in 2x2 ribbing and the face framing is knitted in 1x1 ribbing the rest is knitted in stockinette stitches techniques k3tog - knit 3 together decrease sm - stitch marker m1l - make 1 left increase 2x2 ribbing 1x1 ribbing stockinette stitches information gauge 10 - 12 stitches in stockinette stitches on size 7mm needles = 10 cm completion time 6 - 10 hours level beginner size onesize
